org.locationtech.geowave.core.store

Interface GenericStoreFactory<T>

  • All Superinterfaces:
    GenericFactory
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AccumuloDataStoreFactory, AdapterIndexMappingStoreFactory, AdapterStoreFactory, BaseDataStoreFactory, BaseStoreFactory, BigTableDataStoreFactory, CassandraDataStoreFactory, DataStatisticsStoreFactory, DataStoreOperationsFactory, DynamoDBDataStoreFactory, FileSystemDataStoreFactory, HBaseDataStoreFactory, IndexStoreFactory, InternalAdapterStoreFactory, KuduDataStoreFactory, PropertyStoreFactory, RedisDataStoreFactory, RocksDBDataStoreFactory

    public interface GenericStoreFactory<T>
extends GenericFactory

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      StoreFactoryOptions createOptionsInstance()
      An object used to configure the specific store.
      T createStore(StoreFactoryOptions options)
      Create the store, w/the options instance that was returned and populated w/createOptionsInstance().

      • Methods inherited from interface org.locationtech.geowave.core.store.GenericFactory

        getDescription, getType

    • Method Detail

      • createStore

        T createStore(StoreFactoryOptions options)
        Create the store, w/the options instance that was returned and populated w/createOptionsInstance().

      • createOptionsInstance

        StoreFactoryOptions createOptionsInstance()
        An object used to configure the specific store. This really exists so that the command line options for JCommander can be filled in without knowing which options class we specifically have to create.
